Improvements.Description: There are many magic numbers in this method. Magic numbers are numerical values with unexplained meaning. Replace these magic numbers with named constants to improve readability and maintainability.
The variable name 'elide' does not provide any context about its purpose. Using a more descriptive name makes the code easier to understand and maintain.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- @BeforeAll void init() throws Exception {
+ @BeforeAll public void init() throws Exception {
Improvements.Description: The access modifier for the init() method is not specified. By default, it is package-private. If it needs to be accessed from outside its package, it should be made public.
